How to Play

Controls
  • ↑ or W Move Up
  • ↓ or S Move Down
  • ← or A Move Left
  • → or D Move Right
Power-Ups
  • Speed Boost - Temporarily increases your movement speed
  • Score Multiplier - Doubles your points for a short time
  • Shield - Protects you from one collision
  • Size Reducer - Temporarily shrinks your snake
Objectives
  • Collect pellets to grow longer and score points
  • Avoid hitting obstacles and your own tail
  • Chain pellet collections for combo multipliers
  • Try to achieve the highest score possible!
